name: Joint application submitted (SOLICITOR)
body:
Applicant 1: ((applicant name))
Applicant 2: ((applicant2 name))
Case number: ((reference number))

Dear ((solicitor name))

The joint application between the applicants above has been approved by both parties and submitted. You will receive another email notification when it has been issued. You will then need to confirm receipt. 

Divorce and Dissolution
HM Courts & Tribunals Service
divorcecase@justice.gov.uk
0300 303 0642 (Monday to Friday, 8am to 6pm)

Your feedback helps improve this service for others: https://www.smartsurvey.co.uk/s/Divorce_Feedback/?pageurl=/email
subject: Joint ((isDivorce??divorce))((isDissolution??dissolution)): submitted
